data.persona: We are the people who live in this town. We are common, and there are many of us.
data.description:
You are in the The Lagoon.
The Lagoon is a dark and mysterious place during the night hours.  A lot of moss and lily pads surround the shore.  The water is very murky.
There's a Body parts, a moss, a lily pad, and a Lagoon here.
The monster is here.

You are carrying an basket and a Produce, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I must overcome the fearsome monster
data.mid_motivation: I cannot allow the monster to get into the town and wreak havoc
data.long_motivation: I will be a legend if I defeat the monster singlehandedly
